@package AMASH-fetcher
@version 0.1.0.0

module AMASH.Config

-- | Returns the IP used to connect to the AMASH MongoDB database.
getIP :: IO String

-- | Returns the Port used to connect to the AMASH MongoDB database.
getPort :: IO PortID

-- | Returns the User used to authenticate at the AMASH MongoDB database.
getUser :: IO Text

-- | Returns the Password used to authenticate at the AMASH MongoDB
--   database.
getPassword :: IO Text

module AMASH.Constants
resultsPerPage :: Integer
validProgramArgs :: [[Char]]
showInKebab :: Show a => a -> String
toKebabCase :: [Char] -> [Char]
toKebabCase' :: [Char] -> [Char]
data Application
Confluence :: Application
Jira :: Application
Bitbucket :: Application
showApplication :: Application -> String
data AppsListFilter
Atlassian :: AppsListFilter
Codegeist :: AppsListFilter
Featured :: AppsListFilter
HighestRated :: AppsListFilter

New :: AppsListFilter
Popular :: AppsListFilter
Recent :: AppsListFilter
TopGrossing :: AppsListFilter
TopVendor :: AppsListFilter
Trending :: AppsListFilter
Verified :: AppsListFilter
filtersRelevantForRankings :: [AppsListFilter]
rankingAppsAndFilters :: [(Application, AppsListFilter)]
data Hosting
Server :: Hosting
Cloud :: Hosting
DataCenter :: Hosting

module AMASH.Data.AppsList

module AMASH.MongoDB.Connection

-- | Connect to the database specified in the environment variables. Can
--   fail due to connection errors.
openConnection :: IO Pipe

-- | Authenticate at the database using the credentials specified in the
--   environment variables.
authenticate :: Pipe -> IO Bool

module AMASH.MongoDB.Helpers

-- | Prints out that there are no earlier rankings to compare the new
--   rankings with. Utility function for "checkIfRankingsAreNew".
thereAreNoOlderEntries :: IO (Bool, Maybe a)

-- | Fetches the last saved data and (if it exists) calls the function that
--   compares it with the new data.
getLastSavedDataAndCompare :: () => Pipe -> Action IO [t] -> t -> IO (Bool, Maybe a) -> IO (Bool, Maybe a)

-- | Compares fetchedData with last saved data. Needs attributeName to
--   extract data from document.
compareFetchedAndOldData :: Val a => a -> Label -> Document -> IO (Bool, Maybe ObjectId)

-- | Compares something wrapped in a Maybe with another value and returns
--   false if it doesn't exist.
eqMaybe :: Eq a => Maybe a -> a -> Bool

module AMASH.MongoDB.Querys.GetLastSaved

-- | Builds an action that fetches the last saved rankings entry of an
--   application and category.
getLastSavedRankings :: (MonadIO m) => Text -> Action m [Document]
getLastSavedVendorEntry :: (MonadIO m) => Text -> Text -> Action m [Document]

-- | Builds an action that fetches the last saved vendor contacts entry of
--   a vendor id.
getLastSavedVendorContacts :: (MonadIO m) => Text -> Action m [Document]

-- | Builds an action that fetches the last saved vendor metadata entry for
--   a vendor id.
getLastSavedVendorMetaData :: (MonadIO m) => Text -> Action m [Document]
getLastSavedAppEntry :: (MonadIO m) => Text -> Text -> Action m [Document]

module AMASH.MongoDB.Querys.Select

-- | Selects a document by its objectId from a given collection.
selectByObjectId :: (Select aQueryOrSelection, Val v) => Collection -> v -> aQueryOrSelection

-- | Builds a selection for an application from the rankings database.
selectApplication :: Select aQueryOrSelection => Application -> aQueryOrSelection

-- | Builds a selection for a vendor document from the vendors database.
selectVendor :: Select aQueryOrSelection => Text -> aQueryOrSelection

module AMASH.MongoDB.Querys.TrackedKeys
getAllTrackedAppKeys :: MonadIO m => Pipe -> m [Text]
getAllTrackedVendorKeys :: MonadIO m => Pipe -> m [Text]
insertTrackedAppKeys :: (MonadIO m, Val v) => Pipe -> [v] -> m ()
insertTrackedVendorKeys :: (MonadIO m, Val v) => Pipe -> [v] -> m ()

module AMASH.MongoDB.Querys


-- | Contains / Generates URIs for the Atlassian Marketplace REST API. |
--   All of these URIs are for GET calls.
module AMASH.REST.URIs

-- | The Atlassian Marketplace REST base URI.
baseURI :: String

-- | Provides the Atlassian Marketplace REST base URI. |
--   <a>https://developer.atlassian.com/platform/marketplace/rest/#api-addons-addonKey-get</a>
app :: String -> String

-- | 
--   <a>https://developer.atlassian.com/platform/marketplace/rest/#api-addons-addonKey-distribution-get</a>
appMetrics :: String -> String

-- | 
--   <a>https://developer.atlassian.com/platform/marketplace/rest/#api-addons-addonKey-pricing-cloudOrServer-liveOrPending-get</a>
appPricing :: String -> String -> String

-- | 
--   <a>https://developer.atlassian.com/platform/marketplace/rest/#api-addons-addonKey-recommendations-get</a>
--   | The other apps that appear in the "recommendations" panel below your
--   app.
appRecommendations :: String -> String

-- | 
--   <a>https://developer.atlassian.com/platform/marketplace/rest/#api-addons-addonKey-reviews-get</a>
appReviews :: String -> String
apps :: String
appsPaged :: Integer -> String
buildRankingURI :: Application -> AppsListFilter -> Integer -> String

-- | 
--   <a>https://developer.atlassian.com/platform/marketplace/rest/#api-vendors-vendorId-get</a>
vendor :: String -> String

-- | 
--   <a>https://developer.atlassian.com/platform/marketplace/rest/#api-vendors-vendorId-contacts-get</a>
vendorContacts :: String -> String
vendorAppsPaged :: String -> Integer -> String
vendorArchivedAppsPaged :: String -> Integer -> String

module AMASH.REST.AppKeys

-- | Fetches all existing app and vendor keys and returns them in a tuple.
fetchAllExistingKeys :: IO ([Text], [Text])

module AMASH.MongoDB.Setup

-- | Runs the database setup. The database setup currently just creates
--   necessary empty documents in the rankings database.
runSetup :: Pipe -> IO ()

module AMASH.Util
showRanking :: Application -> AppsListFilter -> String
rankingsCollectionName :: Show a => Application -> a -> [Char]

-- | Given two lists tests if at least one element of the first list is
--   also an element of the second list.
elemAtLeastOne :: (Eq a) => [a] -> [a] -> Bool

module AMASH.REST.VendorApps
fetchVendorApps :: Text -> IO [Text]
fetchVendorArchivedApps :: Text -> IO [Text]

module AMASH.REST.Rankings
getTop100 :: Application -> AppsListFilter -> IO [Text]


-- | Original:
--   <a>http://hackage.haskell.org/package/bson-generic-0.0.8.1/docs/src/Data-Bson-Generic.html</a>
--   - Package was incompatible/unmaintained with so I fixed the problems
--   and just kept the source code here.
module GenericBson
class ToBSON a
toBSON :: ToBSON a => a -> Document
toBSON :: (ToBSON a, Generic a, GConstructorCount (Rep a), GToBSON (Rep a)) => a -> Document
class FromBSON a
fromBSON :: FromBSON a => Document -> Maybe a
fromBSON :: (FromBSON a, Generic a, GConstructorCount (Rep a), GFromBSON (Rep a)) => Document -> Maybe a
newtype ObjectKey
ObjectKey :: Maybe ObjectId -> ObjectKey
[unObjectKey] :: ObjectKey -> Maybe ObjectId
keyLabel :: Label
constructorLabel :: Label
instance GHC.Classes.Eq GenericBson.ObjectKey
instance GHC.Show.Show GenericBson.ObjectKey
instance GHC.Generics.Generic GenericBson.ObjectKey
instance GenericBson.ToBSON GenericBson.ObjectKey
instance (GenericBson.FromBSON a, GenericBson.ToBSON a, Data.Typeable.Internal.Typeable a, GHC.Show.Show a, GHC.Classes.Eq a) => Data.Bson.Val a
instance GenericBson.ToBSON a => GenericBson.GToBSON (GHC.Generics.K1 i a)
instance GenericBson.FromBSON GenericBson.ObjectKey
instance GenericBson.GConstructorCount GHC.Generics.V1
instance GenericBson.GConstructorCount a => GenericBson.GConstructorCount (GHC.Generics.D1 d a)
instance GHC.Generics.Constructor c => GenericBson.GConstructorCount (GHC.Generics.C1 c a)
instance (GenericBson.GConstructorCount a, GenericBson.GConstructorCount b) => GenericBson.GConstructorCount (a GHC.Generics.:+: b)
instance GenericBson.GFromBSON GHC.Generics.U1
instance (GenericBson.GFromBSON a, GenericBson.GFromBSON b) => GenericBson.GFromBSON (a GHC.Generics.:*: b)
instance (GenericBson.GFromBSON a, GenericBson.GFromBSON b) => GenericBson.GFromBSON (a GHC.Generics.:+: b)
instance (GenericBson.GFromBSON a, GHC.Generics.Constructor c) => GenericBson.GFromBSON (GHC.Generics.C1 c a)
instance GenericBson.GFromBSON a => GenericBson.GFromBSON (GHC.Generics.M1 GHC.Generics.D c a)
instance (Data.Bson.Val a, GHC.Generics.Selector s) => GenericBson.GFromBSON (GHC.Generics.S1 s (GHC.Generics.K1 i a))
instance GHC.Generics.Selector s => GenericBson.GFromBSON (GHC.Generics.S1 s (GHC.Generics.K1 i GenericBson.ObjectKey))
instance GenericBson.GToBSON GHC.Generics.U1
instance (GenericBson.GToBSON a, GenericBson.GToBSON b) => GenericBson.GToBSON (a GHC.Generics.:*: b)
instance (GenericBson.GToBSON a, GenericBson.GToBSON b) => GenericBson.GToBSON (a GHC.Generics.:+: b)
instance GenericBson.GToBSON a => GenericBson.GToBSON (GHC.Generics.D1 c a)
instance (GenericBson.GToBSON a, GHC.Generics.Constructor c) => GenericBson.GToBSON (GHC.Generics.C1 c a)
instance (Data.Bson.Val a, GHC.Generics.Selector s) => GenericBson.GToBSON (GHC.Generics.S1 s (GHC.Generics.K1 i a))
instance GHC.Generics.Selector s => GenericBson.GToBSON (GHC.Generics.S1 s (GHC.Generics.K1 i GenericBson.ObjectKey))

module AMASH.MongoDB.VendorApps
persistVendorApps :: Pipe -> Text -> [Text] -> IO ()
persistVendorArchivedApps :: Pipe -> Text -> [Text] -> IO ()

module AMASH.MongoDB.Rankings
persistRankings :: (Val a1, Show a2) => Pipe -> Application -> a2 -> a1 -> IO ()

module AMASH.MongoDB.AppRecommendations
persistAppRecommendations :: Val a => Pipe -> Text -> a -> IO ()

module AMASH.Data.Vendor.VendorSupportDetails
data VendorSupportDetails
VendorSupportDetails :: Maybe SupportOrganization -> Maybe Int -> Maybe SupportHours -> Maybe Text -> VendorSupportDetails
[supportOrg] :: VendorSupportDetails -> Maybe SupportOrganization
[targetResponseTime] :: VendorSupportDetails -> Maybe Int
[supportHours] :: VendorSupportDetails -> Maybe SupportHours
[emergencyContact] :: VendorSupportDetails -> Maybe Text
data SupportOrganization
SupportOrganization :: Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> SupportOrganization
[name] :: SupportOrganization -> Text
[supportEmail] :: SupportOrganization -> Maybe Text
[supportUrl] :: SupportOrganization -> Maybe Text
[supportPhone] :: SupportOrganization -> Maybe Text
data SupportHours
SupportHours :: Maybe TimeRange -> Text -> [Text] -> [Holiday] -> SupportHours
[range] :: SupportHours -> Maybe TimeRange
[timezone] :: SupportHours -> Text
[days] :: SupportHours -> [Text]
[holidays] :: SupportHours -> [Holiday]
data TimeRange
TimeRange :: Text -> Text -> TimeRange
[from] :: TimeRange -> Text
[until] :: TimeRange -> Text
data Holiday
Holiday :: Text -> Text -> Bool -> Holiday
[title] :: Holiday -> Text
[date] :: Holiday -> Text
[repeatAnnually] :: Holiday -> Bool

instance GenericBson.FromBSON AMASH.Data.Vendor.VendorContacts.VendorContact
instance GenericBson.ToBSON AMASH.Data.Vendor.VendorContacts.VendorContact
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON AMASH.Data.Vendor.VendorContacts.VendorContactLinks
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON AMASH.Data.Vendor.VendorContacts.VendorContactLinks
instance GenericBson.FromBSON AMASH.Data.Vendor.VendorContacts.VendorContactLinks
instance GenericBson.ToBSON AMASH.Data.Vendor.VendorContacts.VendorContactLinks
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON AMASH.Data.Vendor.VendorContacts.VendorContactLinksAlternate
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON AMASH.Data.Vendor.VendorContacts.VendorContactLinksAlternate
instance GenericBson.FromBSON AMASH.Data.Vendor.VendorContacts.VendorContactLinksAlternate
instance GenericBson.ToBSON AMASH.Data.Vendor.VendorContacts.VendorContactLinksAlternate

module AMASH.Data.Vendor.VendorCloudSecurity
data VendorCloudSecurity
VendorCloudSecurity :: Bool -> Maybe Text -> Maybe UTCTime -> Maybe UTCTime -> VendorCloudSecurity
[approved] :: VendorCloudSecurity -> Bool
[issueKey] :: VendorCloudSecurity -> Maybe Text
[approvalDate] :: VendorCloudSecurity -> Maybe UTCTime
[expiryDate] :: VendorCloudSecurity -> Maybe UTCTime
instance GHC.Generics.Generic AMASH.Data.Vendor.VendorCloudSecurity.VendorCloudSecurity
instance GHC.Classes.Eq AMASH.Data.Vendor.VendorCloudSecurity.VendorCloudSecurity
instance GHC.Show.Show AMASH.Data.Vendor.VendorCloudSecurity.VendorCloudSecurity
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON AMASH.Data.Vendor.VendorCloudSecurity.VendorCloudSecurity
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON AMASH.Data.Vendor.VendorCloudSecurity.VendorCloudSecurity
instance GenericBson.FromBSON AMASH.Data.Vendor.VendorCloudSecurity.VendorCloudSecurity
instance GenericBson.ToBSON AMASH.Data.Vendor.VendorCloudSecurity.VendorCloudSecurity

module AMASH.Data.Vendor.StorableVendorContact
data StorableVendorContact
StorableVendorContact :: Text -> Text -> StorableVendorContact
[displayName] :: StorableVendorContact -> Text
[userId] :: StorableVendorContact -> Text
vendorContactsToStorable :: VendorContacts -> [StorableVendorContact]
toStorableContact :: VendorContact -> StorableVendorContact
instance GHC.Generics.Generic AMASH.Data.Vendor.StorableVendorContact.StorableVendorContact
instance GHC.Classes.Eq AMASH.Data.Vendor.StorableVendorContact.StorableVendorContact
instance GHC.Show.Show AMASH.Data.Vendor.StorableVendorContact.StorableVendorContact
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON AMASH.Data.Vendor.StorableVendorContact.StorableVendorContact
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON AMASH.Data.Vendor.StorableVendorContact.StorableVendorContact
instance GenericBson.FromBSON AMASH.Data.Vendor.StorableVendorContact.StorableVendorContact
instance GenericBson.ToBSON AMASH.Data.Vendor.StorableVendorContact.StorableVendorContact

module AMASH.MongoDB.VendorContacts
persistVendorContacts :: Pipe -> Text -> [StorableVendorContact] -> IO ()

module AMASH.Data.Vendor.Address
data Address
Address :: Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Address
[line1] :: Address -> Text
[line2] :: Address -> Maybe Text
[city] :: Address -> Maybe Text
[state] :: Address -> Maybe Text
[postCode] :: Address -> Maybe Text
[country] :: Address -> Maybe Text
instance GHC.Generics.Generic AMASH.Data.Vendor.Address.Address
instance GHC.Classes.Eq AMASH.Data.Vendor.Address.Address
instance GHC.Show.Show AMASH.Data.Vendor.Address.Address
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON AMASH.Data.Vendor.Address.Address
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON AMASH.Data.Vendor.Address.Address
instance GenericBson.FromBSON AMASH.Data.Vendor.Address.Address
instance GenericBson.ToBSON AMASH.Data.Vendor.Address.Address

module AMASH.Data.Vendor
data Vendor
Vendor :: Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Address -> Text -> Maybe Text -> VendorExternalLinks -> VendorSupportDetails -> Maybe Text -> Maybe VendorPrograms -> Maybe VendorCloudSecurity -> Maybe VendorSolutionPartner -> Vendor
[name] :: Vendor -> Text
[description] :: Vendor -> Maybe Text
[address] :: Vendor -> Maybe Address
[email] :: Vendor -> Text
[phone] :: Vendor -> Maybe Text
[vendorLinks] :: Vendor -> VendorExternalLinks
[supportDetails] :: Vendor -> VendorSupportDetails
[otherContactDetails] :: Vendor -> Maybe Text
[programs] :: Vendor -> Maybe VendorPrograms
[cloudSecurity] :: Vendor -> Maybe VendorCloudSecurity
[solutionPartner] :: Vendor -> Maybe VendorSolutionPartner
instance GHC.Generics.Generic AMASH.Data.Vendor.Vendor
instance GHC.Classes.Eq AMASH.Data.Vendor.Vendor
instance GHC.Show.Show AMASH.Data.Vendor.Vendor
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON AMASH.Data.Vendor.Vendor
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON AMASH.Data.Vendor.Vendor
instance GenericBson.FromBSON AMASH.Data.Vendor.Vendor
instance GenericBson.ToBSON AMASH.Data.Vendor.Vendor

module AMASH.MongoDB.VendorMetaData
persistVendorMetaData :: Pipe -> Text -> Vendor -> IO ()

module AMASH.Data.AppMetrics
data AppMetrics
AppMetrics :: Integer -> Maybe Integer -> Maybe Integer -> AppMetrics
[downloads] :: AppMetrics -> Integer
[totalInstalls] :: AppMetrics -> Maybe Integer
[totalUsers] :: AppMetrics -> Maybe Integer
instance GHC.Generics.Generic AMASH.Data.AppMetrics.AppMetrics
instance GHC.Classes.Eq AMASH.Data.AppMetrics.AppMetrics
instance GHC.Show.Show AMASH.Data.AppMetrics.AppMetrics
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON AMASH.Data.AppMetrics.AppMetrics
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON AMASH.Data.AppMetrics.AppMetrics
instance GenericBson.FromBSON AMASH.Data.AppMetrics.AppMetrics
instance GenericBson.ToBSON AMASH.Data.AppMetrics.AppMetrics

module AMASH.Data.App.VendorLinks
data VendorLinks
VendorLinks :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> VendorLinks
[issueTracker] :: VendorLinks -> Maybe Text
[supportTicketSystem] :: VendorLinks -> Maybe Text
[appStatusPage] :: VendorLinks -> Maybe Text
[forums] :: VendorLinks -> Maybe Text
[privacy] :: VendorLinks -> Maybe Text
instance GHC.Generics.Generic AMASH.Data.App.VendorLinks.VendorLinks
instance GHC.Classes.Eq AMASH.Data.App.VendorLinks.VendorLinks
instance GHC.Show.Show AMASH.Data.App.VendorLinks.VendorLinks
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON AMASH.Data.App.VendorLinks.VendorLinks
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON AMASH.Data.App.VendorLinks.VendorLinks
instance GenericBson.FromBSON AMASH.Data.App.VendorLinks.VendorLinks
instance GenericBson.ToBSON AMASH.Data.App.VendorLinks.VendorLinks

module AMASH.Data.App
data App
App :: Text -> Text -> Text -> Text -> VendorLinks -> AppEmbedded -> UTCTime -> App
[name] :: App -> Text
[key] :: App -> Text
[summary] :: App -> Text
[tagLine] :: App -> Text
[vendorLinks] :: App -> VendorLinks
[_embedded] :: App -> AppEmbedded
[lastModified] :: App -> UTCTime
instance GHC.Generics.Generic AMASH.Data.App.App
instance GHC.Classes.Eq AMASH.Data.App.App
instance GHC.Show.Show AMASH.Data.App.App
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON AMASH.Data.App.App
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON AMASH.Data.App.App

module AMASH.Data.App.StorableImageAssetSummary
data StorableImageAssetSummary
StorableImageAssetSummary :: Text -> Text -> Text -> StorableImageAssetSummary
[self] :: StorableImageAssetSummary -> Text
[image] :: StorableImageAssetSummary -> Text
[unscaled] :: StorableImageAssetSummary -> Text
createStorableImageAssetSummary :: Maybe ImageAssetSummary -> Maybe StorableImageAssetSummary
instance GHC.Generics.Generic AMASH.Data.App.StorableImageAssetSummary.StorableImageAssetSummary
instance GHC.Classes.Eq AMASH.Data.App.StorableImageAssetSummary.StorableImageAssetSummary
instance GHC.Show.Show AMASH.Data.App.StorableImageAssetSummary.StorableImageAssetSummary
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON AMASH.Data.App.StorableImageAssetSummary.StorableImageAssetSummary
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON AMASH.Data.App.StorableImageAssetSummary.StorableImageAssetSummary
instance GenericBson.FromBSON AMASH.Data.App.StorableImageAssetSummary.StorableImageAssetSummary
instance GenericBson.ToBSON AMASH.Data.App.StorableImageAssetSummary.StorableImageAssetSummary

module AMASH.Data.StorableApp
data StorableApp
StorableApp :: Text -> Text -> Text -> VendorLinks -> UTCTime -> Maybe StorableImageAssetSummary -> [Text] -> Maybe StorableImageAssetSummary -> Maybe StorableImageAssetSummary -> StorableApp
[name] :: StorableApp -> Text
[summary] :: StorableApp -> Text
[tagLine] :: StorableApp -> Text
[vendorLinks] :: StorableApp -> VendorLinks
[lastModified] :: StorableApp -> UTCTime
[banner] :: StorableApp -> Maybe StorableImageAssetSummary
[categories] :: StorableApp -> [Text]
[logo] :: StorableApp -> Maybe StorableImageAssetSummary
[titleLogo] :: StorableApp -> Maybe StorableImageAssetSummary
createStorableApp :: App -> StorableApp
unpackCategories :: Maybe [AddonCategorySummary] -> [Text]
instance GHC.Generics.Generic AMASH.Data.StorableApp.StorableApp
instance GHC.Classes.Eq AMASH.Data.StorableApp.StorableApp
instance GHC.Show.Show AMASH.Data.StorableApp.StorableApp
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON AMASH.Data.StorableApp.StorableApp
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON AMASH.Data.StorableApp.StorableApp
instance GenericBson.FromBSON AMASH.Data.StorableApp.StorableApp
instance GenericBson.ToBSON AMASH.Data.StorableApp.StorableApp

module AMASH.MongoDB.App
persistAppMetrics :: Pipe -> Text -> AppMetrics -> IO ()
persistAppMetadata :: Pipe -> Text -> StorableApp -> IO ()

module AMASH.MongoDB

module AMASH.REST.FetchRecord
fetchAppMetrics :: Text -> IO (Maybe AppMetrics)
fetchAppRecommendations :: Text -> IO (Maybe [Text])
fetchAppMetadata :: Text -> IO (Maybe StorableApp)
fetchVendorMetaData :: Text -> IO (Maybe Vendor)
fetchVendorContacts :: Text -> IO (Maybe [StorableVendorContact])

module AMASH.REST


-- | The AMASH Library containing functions for fetching and persisting
--   Atlassian Marketplace data.
module AMASH

-- | Fetches all rankings from the marketplace. Needs an authenticated
--   MongoDB pipe.
fetchRankings :: Pipe -> IO ()

-- | Fetches all vendors from the marketplace. Needs an authenticated
--   MongoDB pipe.
fetchVendors :: Pipe -> IO ()

-- | Fetches all apps from the marketplace. Needs an authenticated MongoDB
--   pipe.
fetchApps :: Pipe -> IO ()


-- | A Lib module.
module Lib

-- | Calculate the square of a number.
square :: Num a => a -> a

-- | Fetches and prints the metadata for a given vendor id (e.g. "1210714")
fetchVendorMetaData :: String -> IO ()

-- | Fetches and prints the metadata for a given plugin key (e.g.
--   "de.scandio.confluence.plugins.pocketquery")
fetchPluginMetaData :: String -> IO ()
